supporting_quotes: he is a three-term member of the National Assembly, currently representing the Nowon B constituency in Seoul.
Assumed office June 14, 2018

roles: Member representing Nowon District Byeong constituency
supporting_quotes: In 2018, Kim successfully ran for the National Assembly in a by-election for the Nowon District Byeong constituency, filling the vacancy left by Ahn Cheol-soo.

additional_context.election_details: defeated Lee Jun-seok of the Bareunmirae Party

additional_context.election_notes: won in 2010 defeating incumbent, re-elected in 2014
